response.original_title: The Simply Grand Quigley Band: The Disappearing Dessert Disaster - Generosity
response.overview: An ant farm provides a great lesson in generosity and sharing for kids. But when Lemon accidentally leaves the top off the ant farm there are some interesting results. Everyone learns about sharing at the Village's food drive, especially Bubba who gives his best jelly beans.
response.title: The Simply Grand Quigley Band: The Disappearing Dessert Disaster - Generosity
